product_name: Nite Ize Moonlit LED Area Light
long_description: The Nite Ize Moonlit LED area light shines a soft glow across a wide area and perches on a flexible and versatile Gear Tie base. Encased in durable polycarbonate plastic housing, the battery-powered light has 2 functions: steady glow and continuous flash. Strong, bendable wire Gear Tie base features a sturdy rubber exterior and can be configured at either end to position the light at almost any angle imaginable. Loop to hang, twist to attach, bend to prop-even wear it around your neck for hands-free illumination, precisely where you need it. The Nite Ize Moonlit LED area light runs on 2 lithium 3V batteries that are easy to replace.
short_description: The Nite Ize Moonlit LED area light shines a soft glow across a wide area and perches on a flexible and versatile Gear Tie base.
